attributes.action: Mandatory Menopause Training For Every GP
attributes.additional_details: GPs have minimal to no training in menopause. Half of their patients will go through menopause and turn to them for help. As it stands, too many women are being turned away, told they need psychological and/or psychiatric help. Put on antidepressants and sent away. These do not help replace depleted hormones. Therefore, every GP should go through mandatory menopause training so more women are given the help and support they need.
attributes.background: Ensure that every GP receives full menopause training.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Programmes of studies and medical qualification are a matter for the awarding bodies and not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require nurses who are educated in menopause working in every healthcare setting: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653512
